structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
Executive Office For Administration And Finance

law.catch_line: Supervision Of State Printing By State Purchasing Agent
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 165, Sec. 32 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] The state purchasing agent shall supervise the state printing and all publications by the commonwealth shall be printed under the agent's direction; provided, that this section shall not apply to topographic maps issued by state departments, to legislative printing or to publications required to be issued by the state secretary under sections 2 to 4, inclusive, or under chapter 90 of the resolves of 1920 or any other special law. All publications by the commonwealth shall be distributed under the direction of the state secretary unless otherwise provided.
